name: Matching Pairs Game For Adults
description:
Matching Pairs Game For Adults is a free to download Android mobile game application where you need to match the fruits with numbers as here the matching pairs are fruits and numbers this matching pair game is designed for seniors and adults whose age groups are above 15.

Game play : Initially with in 15 seconds of time period fruits and numbers are shown to you. Just try to remember the combination pair and after the time period the fruits are shuffled and a random is shown to the user to guess the appropriate matching fruit for the number shown one wrong matching pairs will surely cost in two negative marks.So this game will be useful to check you memory concentration level or simple we can call this Matching Pairs Game For Adults as a memory enhancing game which will be used to test your brain memory concentration level.So do you want to improve your memory play this Matching Pairs Game For Adults for free.

Get game for free : Matching Pairs Game For Adults
